Reviews.Title: Great phone for $100 (Sept 2012)
Reviews.Author: igorevich
Reviews.Content: I paid $200 in July 2012, then the price dropped down to ~$100 in August-September.Now I think $200 was too much for this, but $100 is great unless you need camera, which is, honestly, crap.Good:- feels nice, sounds & vibrates nice, though relatively heavy and doesn't look sexy- dropped a couple of times, but didn't break yet- no issues with standard apps- easily installed Russian language pack- GPS works fineBad:- camera is really bad- no surprise that battery is not good- too slow for even simple Disney games- too little memory, makes no sense to buy without SD-card- not always auto-switches to registered Wi-Fi spots, almost never offers new spots

Reviews.Title: Not Great
Reviews.Author: David Hauser
Reviews.Content: I loved how small but powerful the phone was. Easy to use but has a buzz sound when talking on the phone.Do not purchase if you want to use your phone to actually talk to someone else.

Reviews.Title: not the best phone.
Reviews.Author: kenzie
Reviews.Content: Ive had this phone for about six months. It worked great at first then it started messing up and it is not at all durable.

Reviews.Title: Mone
Reviews.Author: Mone
Reviews.Content: This really is a nice phone..my only problem with it is that it does not have much space to download apps and the ones it comes with you cant delete em..u can make many home screens..the icons at the bottom slide over so u dont have to switch screens to see em..also the phone mutes alot when you talking or holds..really nice can surf the web while ur on the phone too..the only reason why im letting it go is cause i go threw phones and wanted different

Reviews.Title: Good phone but no drivers or customer support
Reviews.Author: Louis Dominguez "BigDog-CT"
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone for the money, I brought it for $79.99No problems with it at all, except for the fact that you cannot find USB drivers.(this is the reason I only gave 3 stars)The standard windows USB drivers don't work, and you can't find them anywhere.Even the BLU Products website is worthless, and customer service ignores your emails.If you don't plan to sync your info with your PC, than this phone will be OK.If your like me and need to sync, Don't Buy a BLU product.By the way: It Does Not come with any micro memory card, so you must buy one.

Reviews.Title: I LIKE
Reviews.Author: CHARLES MORGADO
Reviews.Content: I like this cellphone, is lovely, easy to use, I have no problem  with the signal in my country Venezuela, I am using the Movilnet signal, I can use internet but is best used with data plan because no plan is too expensive. the bad is have no much memory, not enough for more than a photo unless you use sd card

Reviews.Title: One Flaw.
Reviews.Author: Drake
Reviews.Content: Okay, The Phone Arrived On Time, It Was A Good Looking Phone. Had The Phone, Headphones, Charger, And Manual.i Turn It On And Just Checking It Out, Putting My Wifi Pass In.So then After A Couple Of Hours I Wanna See How It "Sounds", So I Go On The YouTube App, And Type In A Song Name, And Click It, No Sound? Turn The Voulume Up, No Sound? I Put Headphones In And Then I Care Here It.The Phone Wont Play Sound Without Headphones, SO I Though It Was Just Made Like That? But After Pushing Down On The Back (Without Headphones In, And Music Playing) I Heard The Music Play.I Took The Back Off To Look At The Speaker, I Just Pushed Down Really Hard On It, And It Started To Play Without Me Holding Down The Back, It Does Stop SOmetimes But Just A Kind Of Push with The Finger To The Back Makes It Work Again!But The Phone Is Great, Nice Sensitivity, Fast, All Togather The Phone Is Great, Even With That Small Flaw.
